mapper.select: select * from people_info where people_army_id = (select army_id from army_info where army_type = #{army_info})
mapper.insert: insert into people_info(people_army_id, people_army_name, people_name, people_job, people_sex, people_nationality, military_rank, birthplace, birthday, enlistment, graduated_school, people_profession, education, comment) values(#{people_army_id}, #{people_army_name}, #{people_name}, #{people_job}, #{people_sex}, #{people_nationality}, #{military_rank}, #{birthplace}, #{birthday}, #{enlistment}, #{graduated_school}, #{people_profession}, #{education}, #{comment})
mapper.update: UPDATE people_info SET checks = #{check} WHERE people_id = #{people_id};
